entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie late this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
